summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating a portion of the northerly half of East Pike Street adjoining Lots 1 through 12 in Block 11 of McKenzie and Dempsey's Lake Washington Addition to the City of Seattle, as per plat recorded in Volume 7 of Plats, Page 20, Records of King County, lying between the westerly margin of Lake Washington Boulevard, as established by Ordinance No. 23130 of The City of Seattle, and the center line of 39th Avenue; together with the portion of the northeasterly half of 39th Avenue lying between the northerly margin of said East Pike Street and the production west of the north line of said Lot 1, on the petition of John Sangster; accepting an easement; and a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Clerk File 299148).
